about_the_game:
Purchase this Fashion item in order to unlock an alternate appearance for Reiketsu!
Resident beauty Reiketsu never lets a chance to be stylish slip by! Sporting an elegant bikini, she will be sure to turn heads in this scorching Summer heat!

*Equip an Fashion item to change the appearance of a respective character.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything w/ OpenGL support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
